1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Koshucode syntactic tool.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax
6  ( koshuSyntaxMain
7    -- * koshu-syntax.hs
8    -- $koshu-syntax.hs
9  ) where
10
11import qualified System.Console.GetOpt                   as G
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                    as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                    as C
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version as L
18
19
20-- ----------------------  Option
21
22data Option
23    = OptHelp
24    | OptVersion
25    | OptStdin
26    | OptOmitBlank
27    | OptDict
28    | OptEncoding
29      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Enum, Bounded)
30
31koshuSyntaxOptions :: [G.OptDescr Option]
32koshuSyntaxOptions =
33    [ G.Option "h" ["help"]        (G.NoArg OptHelp)        "Print help message."
34    , G.Option "V" ["version"]     (G.NoArg OptVersion)     "Print version number."
35    , G.Option "i" ["stdin"]       (G.NoArg OptStdin)       "Read from stdin."
36    , G.Option "b" ["omit-blank"]  (G.NoArg OptOmitBlank)   "Omit space and comment tokens."
37    , G.Option ""  ["dict"]        (G.NoArg OptDict)        "Show dictionary."
38    , G.Option ""  ["encoding"]    (G.NoArg OptEncoding)    "Show character encoding."
39    ]
40
41version :: String
42version = "koshu-syntax-" ++ L.versionString
43
44usage :: String
45usage = G.usageInfo usageDesc koshuSyntaxOptions
46
47usageDesc :: String
48usageDesc = unlines
49    [ "DESCRIPTION"
50    , "  Syntaxtic tool of Koshucode."
51    , ""
52    , "USAGE"
53    , "  koshu-syntax [OPTIONS ...] FILE.k    # single file"
54    , "  koshu-syntax [OPTIONS ...] -i        # standard input"
55    , ""
56    ] ++ "OPTIONS"
57
58
59-- ----------------------  Main
60
61-- | The main function for @koshu-syntax@ command.
62koshuSyntaxMain :: IO ()
63koshuSyntaxMain = koshuSyntaxMain' =<< B.progAndArgs
64
65koshuSyntaxMain' :: (String, [String]) -> IO ()
66koshuSyntaxMain' (_, argv) =
67    case G.getOpt G.Permute koshuSyntaxOptions argv of
68      (opts, files, [])
69          | has OptHelp          -> B.putSuccess usage
70          | has OptVersion       -> B.putSuccessLn version
71          | has OptDict          -> dumpDict
72          | has OptEncoding      -> B.putSuccessLn =<< B.currentEncodings
73          | has OptStdin         -> dumpStdin omit
74          | length files == 1    -> dumpFile omit $ head files
75          | otherwise            -> B.putFailure usage
76          where has     = (`elem` opts)
77                omit    = has OptOmitBlank
78
79      (_, _, errs)    -> B.putFailure $ concat errs
80
81
82-- ----------------------  Dump
83
84dumpDesc :: FilePath -> B.CommentDoc
85dumpDesc path = B.CommentDoc [desc, input, js] where
86    desc   = B.CommentSec "DESCRIPTION" [ "Clauses and tokens" ]
87    input  = B.CommentSec "INPUT" [ path ]
88    js     = B.CommentSec "JUDGES"
89             [ "|-- CLAUSE  /clause -> /clause-type"
90             , "|-- LINE    /line -> /clause"
91             , "|-- TOKEN   /line /column -> /token-type [/token-subtype] /cont"
92             , ""
93             , "{| There is a clause numbered /clause on /line ."
94             , "   Type of the clause is /clause-type ."
95             , "   There is a token of content /cont at /line and /column ."
96             , "   Type of the token is /token-type ."
97             , "   Some tokens are classified into /token-subtype . |}" ]
98
99judgeClause :: Int -> C.Clause -> C.JudgeC
100judgeClause clseq c = D.affirm "CLAUSE" args where
101    args = [ ("clause"       , D.pInt clseq)
102           , ("clause-type"  , D.pText $ C.clauseTypeText c)]
103
104judgeLine :: Int -> S.TokenLine -> C.JudgeC
105judgeLine clseq (B.CodeLine ln _ _) = D.affirm "LINE" args where
106    args = [ ("line"         , D.pInt ln)
107           , ("clause"       , D.pInt clseq) ]
108
109judgeToken :: Int -> S.Token -> C.JudgeC
110judgeToken ln tok = D.affirm "TOKEN" $ D.omitEmpty args where
111    args = [ ("line"           , D.pInt ln)
112           , ("column"         , D.pInt $ B.codePtColumnNo $ head $ B.codePtList tok)
113           , ("token-type"     , D.pText $ S.subtypeName tok)
114           , ("token-subtype"  , D.maybeEmpty D.pText $ S.tokenDetailTypeString tok)
115           , ("cont"           , D.pText $ S.tokenContent  tok) ]
116
117dumpFile :: Bool -> FilePath -> IO ()
118dumpFile omit path = dumpCode omit path =<< readFile path
119
120dumpStdin :: Bool -> IO ()
121dumpStdin omit = dumpCode omit "(stdin)" =<< getContents
122
123dumpCode :: Bool -> FilePath -> String -> IO ()
124dumpCode omit path code = 
125    f $ S.tokenLines (B.NIOPoint 0 $ B.IOPointFile "" path) code
126    where f ts = do let cs = C.consClause [] 0 ts
127                    O.putLines $ B.texts $ dumpDesc path
128                    dumpClause omit `mapM_` zip [1 ..] cs
129                    putNewline
130
131dumpClause :: Bool -> (Int, C.Clause) -> IO ()
132dumpClause _ (_, C.Clause _ (C.CUnknown (Left a))) =
133    do putNewline
134       B.abortPrint [] a
135dumpClause omit (clseq, c) =
136    do let src = C.clauseSource $ C.clauseHead c
137           ls  = B.clauseLines src
138       putNewline
139       O.putLines $ map comment ls
140       putNewline
141       putJudge $ judgeClause clseq c
142       dumpLine clseq ls
143       dumpToken omit `mapM_` ls
144    where
145      comment line = "*** " ++ B.lineContent line
146
147dumpLine :: Int -> [S.TokenLine] -> IO ()
148dumpLine clseq ls = putJudges $ map (judgeLine clseq) ls
149
150dumpToken :: Bool -> S.TokenLine -> IO ()
151dumpToken omit (B.CodeLine ln _ toks) =
152    do putNewline
153       putJudges $ map (judgeToken ln) toks'
154    where
155      toks' | omit       = B.omit S.isBlankToken toks
156            | otherwise  = toks
157
158
159-- ----------------------  Dictionary
160
161dumpDict :: IO ()
162dumpDict =
163    do O.putLines $ B.texts descDict
164       putNewline
165       putJudges judgesClauseType
166       putNewline
167       putJudges judgesTokenType
168       putNewline
169
170descDict :: B.CommentDoc
171descDict = B.CommentDoc [desc, js] where
172    desc   = B.CommentSec "DESCRIPTION" [ "Clauses and tokens" ]
173    js     = B.CommentSec "JUDGES"
174             [ "|-- CLAUSE-TYPE  /clause-type"
175             , "|-- TOKEN-TYPE   /token-type"
176             , ""
177             , "{| /clause-type is one of cluase types."
178             , "   /token-type is one of token types. |}" ]
179
180judgeClauseType :: C.Clause -> C.JudgeC
181judgeClauseType c = D.affirm "CLAUSE-TYPE" args where
182    args = [ ("clause-type", D.pText $ C.clauseTypeText c) ]
183
184judgeTokenType :: S.Token -> C.JudgeC
185judgeTokenType t = D.affirm "TOKEN-TYPE" args where
186    args = [ ("token-type", D.pText $ S.subtypeName t) ]
187
188judgesClauseType :: [C.JudgeC]
189judgesClauseType = map j cs where
190    j x = judgeClauseType $ C.Clause B.def x
191    cs  = [ C.CRelmap "" []
192          , C.CAssert D.AssertAffirm "" []
193          , C.CJudge  D.AssertAffirm "" []
194          , C.CSlot "" []
195          ]
196
197judgesTokenType :: [C.JudgeC]
198judgesTokenType = map j cs where
199    j x = judgeTokenType x
200    cs  = [ S.TTextRaw  B.def ""
201          , S.TSlot     B.def 0 ""
202          , S.TTermPath B.def []
203          , S.TOpen     B.def ""
204          , S.TClose    B.def ""
205          , S.TSpace    B.def 0
206          , S.TComment  B.def ""
207          ]
208
209
210-- ----------------------  Utility
211
212putJudges :: (B.MixShortEncode c) => [D.Judge c] -> IO ()
213putJudges = mapM_ putJudge
214
215putJudge :: (B.MixShortEncode a) => a -> IO ()
216putJudge = B.putMixLn B.crlfBreak . B.mixIdEncode
217
218putNewline :: IO ()
219putNewline = putStrLn ""
220
221
222-- ----------------------
223-- $koshu-syntax.hs
224--
225-- @koshu-syntax@ command is implemented using 'koshuSyntaxMain'.
226--
227-- > import Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntaxMain
228-- > 
229-- > main :: IO ()
230-- > main = koshuSyntaxMain
231--
232
